content: So please take this piece of <color=#8AAB4B>Amber Ore</color>~! After all, placing resources in the hands of those who can best utilize them is truly the most efficient way to manage them.
info: 赠送开馆素材-幻雪_主流程文本2

content: Recently, I've seen you running around all over the place.\nI asked Sani and she told me that\nyou're actually hard at work building the Omni-Gallery.
